```{r setup}

```



# Priors for Exchangeable Units

## Normal `N()`

```{r}
x <- N()
draws <- generate(x, n = 10, n_draw = 18)
ggplot(draws, aes(x = x, y = value)) +
  facet_wrap(vars(draw), nrow = 3) +
  geom_point() +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 8))
```

```{r}
x <- N(s = 0.05)
draws <- generate(x, n = 10, n_draw = 20)
ggplot(draws, aes(x = x, y = value)) +
  facet_wrap(vars(draw)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_continuous(n.breaks = 10) +
  xlab("Unit") +
  ylab("") +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 8))
```





# Priors for Series

## Random Walk `RW()`

```{r}
x <- RW()
draws <- generate(x, n = 30, n_draw = 20)
ggplot(draws, aes(x = x, y = value)) +
  facet_wrap(vars(draw), nrow = 4) +
  geom_line() +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 8))
```



```{r}
x <- RW(s = 0.01)
draws <- generate(x, n = 30, n_draw = 20)
ggplot(draws, aes(x = x, y = value)) +
  facet_wrap(vars(draw), nrow = 4) +
  geom_line() +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 8))
```
